duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing and directing all field construction activities for projects typically valued between $150 million and $500 million.
Ensuring conformance with project plans, specifications, schedules, and cost estimates.
Thorough working knowledge and background of assigned work, dealing with complex situations holistically.
Directing other line supervision to meet or exceed all project objectives.
Coordinating and directing construction craftsmen and managing contractors/subcontractors.
Executing field construction activities in conformance with project requirements and safety standards.
Controlling project schedule and cost through efficient use of resources.
Playing an active role in the development of the safety culture on the project.
Providing proposal/project support and other duties as assigned.
Ensuring all work is in compliance with approved scope boundaries and pertinent requirements.
Serving as the single point of accountability to senior management, the client, and the community.

education_certification.credential: Accredited four (4) year degree or global equivalent in applicable field of study and eighteen (18) years of work-related experience or a combination of education and directly related experience equal to twenty-two (22) years if non-degreed.
Proven ability promoting outstanding customer service and client relations.
Functional proficiency in project controls, human relations, industrial relations, and contract management.
